entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: COVID-19 misinformation
entity.description: This is a list of Tweets highlighting corrections to misinformation surrounding COVID-19 from experts, fact-checkers and journalists.

text:
For 80 days, the US was on a long plateau of new #COVID19 confirmed cases, ~20,000/day. Then, with reopening, a surge started June 8th.
Today, supassing the threshold of 40K for the 1st time to 43,603 cases
https://t.co/1HqPnhkmFi https://t.co/I3hNU0MMGW
